Class TransportSegment

java.lang.Object
dev.moriamap.model.Edge
dev.moriamap.model.TransportSegment
public class TransportSegment extends Edge
A TransportSegment is an Edge of our Graph

      public static TransportSegment from(Stop from, Stop to, String lineName, String variantName, Duration travelDuration, double distance)
      Static factory method returning a TransportSegment
      Parameters:
      from - The origin of this TransportSegment
      to - The destination of this TransportSegment
      lineName - The name of the line of this TransportSegment
      variantName - The name of the variant of this TransportSegment
      travelDuration - The travel time of this TransportSegment
      distance - The distance of this Transport Segment
      Returns:
      a new TransportSegment

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object object)
      Check if this transport segment is equal to the given transport segment.

      Two transport segment are equal if they have the same from, the same to, lineVariantName, the same distance and the same travelDuration

      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      object - to be compared to
      Returns:
      true if this is equal to object
